description: Pool details dashboard for pgagroal connection pooler. Shows authentication metrics, connection limits, and per-database/user statistics.

panels.description: Failed authentications due to bad password
panels.title: Auth Bad Password
Connection Leak Risk
panels.description: Ratio of connections not returned to the pool over time. Values > 0 indicate possible leaks.

panels.title: Authentication Over Time
panels.description: Trend of successful vs failed authentications.

panels.title: Connection Lifecycle
panels.description: New connections acquired vs returned to pool.

panels.title: Connection Issues
panels.description: Errors related to connection establishment or liveness.

panels.title: Connection Timeouts
panels.description: Occurrences of idle or process timeouts.

title: pgagroal Pool Details
